item.title: Birth of This Blog
item.description: Intro A blog, a truncation of “web-log” is a diary of an entity, that logs the journey of the entity in the web. The entity can be a person, an organization, a company or an object. Nowadays almost everyone has a blog and in that they ‘logs’ their thoughts, opinions and discoveries. For a organization a blog is very helpful in sharing knowledge with the members and showcasing the works being done.
